page.title: 17FASHION IN DENBIGH.
page.content: It is interesting to see a more liberal attitude towards clothes.This is especially so in the case of teenagers and young adults.It is common to see many varied fashions being acceptable amongst the same peer group. Males are not as conservative in their dress and it is now common for young men to dye their hair,wear jewellery and even wear forms of makeup. It is common to see many groups dressed in similar or near identical clothing e.g. punk rockers,motorbike enthusiasts. Young teenagers especially girls have taken to "dressing up" during all leisure time.Their dress, especially footwear, being non- conducive for "rough and tumble" type playing.
